subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Casey Martin, who battled the PGA Tour for the right to use a golf cart in competition, was named coach of the Oregon golf team. Martin, 33, has a circulatory disorder in his right leg. The Tour argued in court that walking was an integral part of competition. Martin won the right to use the vehicle, and the legal case was ultimately affirmed by the Supreme Court.
